name: Monkey Pee, Monkey Poo
description:
Become a Urine Collector in the Jungles of Borneo! Live the adventure! Experience the Glamour! Chase a different kind of gold!

In the Gunung Palung National Park in Borneo, researchers work tirelessly to study and treat the health problems of the endangered orangutans who live there.

In order to conduct their research, scientists need a constant flow of fresh Urine from these primates. It is the best way to non-invasively gather samples. 

It seems gross, but it is the job of APE URINE COLLECTORS to gather these samples from the animals in the wild. This game is a fun look at the work of these noble and important scientists.

For more information:

https://savegporangutans.org/gunung-palung/about-gunung-palung/
